title: CONTACT
name: Academy of Cryptography Techniques
description: The Academy of Cryptography Techniques is a public university under the Government Cipher Committee. It offers programs in Information Technology, Cybersecurity, and Telecommunications Engineering, with a strong focus on Cryptography and Network Security.
address: 141 Chien Thang Street, Tan Trieu, Thanh Tri District, Hanoi
findUsDescription: Visit our campus or use the map to get directions
quickContactDescription: Call us directly for immediate assistance
visitCampusDescription: Come see our facilities in person
